mapper.select: select id, dl_number, supplierid, wid, sp_shopid, sp_name, sp_Company, sp_jprice, number, loss_number, zje, sp_Specifications, sp_color, beizhu from projects.document_shop where id = #{id}
select id, dl_number, supplierid, wid, sp_shopid, sp_name, sp_Company, sp_jprice, number, loss_number, zje, sp_Specifications, sp_color, beizhu from projects.document_shop limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into projects.document_shop(dl_number, supplierid, wid, sp_shopid, sp_name, sp_Company, sp_jprice, number, loss_number, zje, sp_Specifications, sp_color, beizhu) values (#{dlNumber}, #{supplierid}, #{wid}, #{spShopid}, #{spName}, #{spCompany}, #{spJprice}, #{number}, #{lossNumber}, #{zje}, #{spSpecifications}, #{spColor}, #{beizhu})

insert into projects.document_shop(dl_number, supplierid, wid, sp_shopid, sp_name, sp_Company, sp_jprice, number, loss_number, zje, sp_Specifications, sp_color, beizhu) values
(#{entity.dlNumber}, #{entity.supplierid}, #{entity.wid}, #{entity.spShopid}, #{entity.spName}, #{entity.spCompany}, #{entity.spJprice}, #{entity.number}, #{entity.lossNumber}, #{entity.zje}, #{entity.spSpecifications}, #{entity.spColor}, #{entity.beizhu})

insert into projects.document_shop(dl_number, supplierid, wid, sp_shopid, sp_name, sp_Company, sp_jprice, number, loss_number, zje, sp_Specifications, sp_color, beizhu) values
(#{entity.dlNumber}, #{entity.supplierid}, #{entity.wid}, #{entity.spShopid}, #{entity.spName}, #{entity.spCompany}, #{entity.spJprice}, #{entity.number}, #{entity.lossNumber}, #{entity.zje}, #{entity.spSpecifications}, #{entity.spColor}, #{entity.beizhu})
on duplicate key update dl_number = values(dl_number) , supplierid = values(supplierid) , wid = values(wid) , sp_shopid = values(sp_shopid) , sp_name = values(sp_name) , sp_Company = values(sp_Company) , sp_jprice = values(sp_jprice) , number = values(number) , loss_number = values(loss_number) , zje = values(zje) , sp_Specifications = values(sp_Specifications) , sp_color = values(sp_color) , beizhu = values(beizhu)
mapper.update:
update projects.document_shop
dl_number = #{dlNumber},
supplierid = #{supplierid},
wid = #{wid},
sp_shopid = #{spShopid},
sp_name = #{spName},
sp_Company = #{spCompany},
sp_jprice = #{spJprice},
number = #{number},
loss_number = #{lossNumber},
zje = #{zje},
sp_Specifications = #{spSpecifications},
sp_color = #{spColor},
beizhu = #{beizhu},
where id = #{id}
